name: Climax
short_description: Climax is a Java command line argument parser framework that allows you to create and customize your own command line interface. The command line help and version information can be customized using built-in Apache-Ant-like properties.
summary: A Java command line argument parser framework

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: MIT License

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: Developers
